name: Heroes of Zulula
description:
You didn't miss'em, but they're back anyway! The Champions of Zulula return in this hilarious strategy RPG. The vile Akolan declares himself overlord of Zulula and bans the tournament forever! Grunty the Cyclop, Ledouche the Knight and Oulette the Slime join forces along with other ex-champions to kick Akolan’s behind and bring the tournament back!

* Turn-based strategy: Move your armies around the 10 different battlefields (more to come).
* Item system: A variety of items alter your characters' stats and powers.
* Combat layer: Position your forces, establish a battle plan, then watch individual warriors execute your strategy in realtime simulated combat.
* A no-holds-barred storyline featuring silly, foul-mouthed characters
* Arena mode allows you to test different tactics before committing to them in story mode.
* Free to play game with downloadable levels, monsters and features

The same team that gave you Champions of Zulula Elite Edition back in 1995 reunites to bring you the further adventures of Grunty and company! All in glorious retro-styled visuals and audio!

This Desktop edition includes all in-app purchases the mobile version has, a 5$ value!

Pay what you want for the Linux version for a limited time!  (It's still untested)

Controls are identical to the touch version, except WASD support was added for camera movement, and Q and E for camera rotation.  More PC customization (including controller support) is in the road map.
